amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding management of the Strategic Petroleum Reserve to lower the burden of gasoline prices on the economy of the United States and circumvent the efforts of OPEC to reap windfall profits.

action.text: Amendment SA 805 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Motion to table amendment SA 805 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 39. Record Vote Number: 147.
